xml:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/dateend"/>     </skos:ConceptScheme>       <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/datestart">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">Date Start</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">Starting date of expedition         </skos:definition>         <dc:date>2012-09-14T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>       <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/dateend">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">Date End</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">Ending date of expedition         </skos:definition>         <dc:date>2012-09-14T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/port">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">Port</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">Port of call for the research vessel         </skos:definition>         <dc:date>2012-09-14T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/program">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">Program</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">One of DSPD, ODP, or IODP to designate the various programs             that drilling was done under         </skos:definition>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/operator">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">Operator</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">One of USIO, ESO , or CDEX to designate the organization under which             an expedition was operated         </skos:definition>         <skos:narrower rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/ESO"/>         <skos:narrower rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/CDEX"/>         <skos:narrower rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/USIO"/>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/curator">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">Curator</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">One of USIO, ESO , or CDEX to designate the organization under which             an expedition was curated         </skos:definition>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/ESO">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">ESO</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel xml:lang="en">ESO is a consortium of European scientific institutions formed to undertake             Mission-specific platform (MSP) operations for ECORD on behalf of the Integrated Ocean Drilling Program.         </skos:altLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">         </skos:definition>         <skos:broader rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/operator"/>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>         <dc:source rdf:resource="http://www.eso.ecord.org/"></dc:source>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/CDEX">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">CDEX</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel xml:lang="en">Center for Deep Earth Exploration             Japan Agency for Marine-Earth Science and Technology         </skos:altLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">         </skos:definition>         <skos:broader rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/operator"/>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>         <dc:source rdf:resource="http://www.jamstec.go.jp/chikyu/eng/index.html"></dc:source>     </skos:Concept>       <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/USIO">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">USIO</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel xml:lang="en">United States Implementing Organizations</skos:altLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">The USIO's for IODP are LDEO and Texas A and M University. The             are charged with carrying out the IODP program activities.         </skos:definition>         <skos:broader rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/operator"/>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/DSDP">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">DSDP</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel xml:lang="en">Deep Sea Drilling Program</skos:altLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">The Deep Sea Drilling Project (DSDP) was the first of three             international scientific ocean drilling programs that have operated over more than 40             years. It was on June 24, 1966, that the Prime Contract between the National Science             Foundation (NSF) and The Regents, University of California was signed. This contract             began Phase I of the DSDP, which was based out of Scripps Institution of Oceanography at             the University of California, San Diego. Global Marine, Inc. conducted the drilling             operations.         </skos:definition>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <owl:sameas rdf:resource='http://rdf.freebase.com/ns/m/0396ww' />            <owl:sameas rdf:resource='http://dbpedia.org/page/Deep_Sea_Drilling_Program' />         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/ODP">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">ODP</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel xml:lang="en">Ocean Drilling Program</skos:altLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">The Ocean Drilling Program (ODP) conducted basic research             into Earth processes by recovering sediment and rock samples from below the ocean floor             and using the resulting holes to perform downhole measurements and experiments. ODP was             funded by the U.S. National Science Foundation and 22 international partners and was             directed by the international Earth science community (JOIDES). Joint Oceanographic             Institutions, Inc. (JOI), now Consortium for Ocean Leadership Inc., served as the             Program Manager. Texas A and M University, College of Geosciences was the Science             Operator and Lamont-Doherty Earth Observatory of Columbia University provided Logging             Services and administered the Site Survey Data Bank.         </skos:definition>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <owl:sameas rdf:resource='http://rdf.freebase.com/ns/m/05qbt6' />             <owl:sameas rdf:resource='http://dbpedia.org/page/Integrated_Ocean_Drilling_Program' />         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/IODP">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">IODP</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel xml:lang="en">Integrated Ocean Drilling Program</skos:altLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">The Integrated Ocean Drilling Program (IODP) is an             international marine research program that explores the Earth's history and structure as             recorded in seafloor sediments and rocks, and monitors subseafloor environments. IODP             builds upon earlier successes of the Deep Sea Drilling Project (DSDP) and Ocean Drilling             Program (ODP), which revolutionized our view of Earth history and global processes             through ocean basin exploration. IODP greatly expands the reach of these previous             programs by using multiple drilling platforms, including riser, riserless, and             mission-specific, to achieve its scientific goals. The program's principal themes are             outlined in the Initial Science Plan: "Earth, Oceans and Life: Scientific Investigations             of the Earth System Using Multiple Drilling Platforms and New Technologies." The deep             biosphere and the subseafloor ocean; Environmental change, processes and effects; and             Solid earth cycles and geodynamics.         </skos:definition>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/expedition">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">Expedition</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel xml:lang="en">Leg</skos:altLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">A cruise of a research vessel. Crusies are typically 2 months             in length and the mission is described in a exedition prospectus. Expeditions sail under             a program.         </skos:definition>         <owl:sames rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/leg"/>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>        <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/leg">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">Leg</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel xml:lang="en">Expedition</skos:altLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">A cruise of a research vessel. Crusies are typically 2 months             in length and the mission is described in a exedition prospectus. Expeditions sail under             a program.         </skos:definition>           <owl:sames rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/expedition"/>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/site">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">Site</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">A specific site drilled during an expedition. Sites are             labled in sequence numerically from the start of the first program (DSDP). They may have             special modifers on the number to designate things like a test site, special funding for             the effort, etc.         </skos:definition>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/hole">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">hole</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">An entries into the sea floor at a site. There are typically             multiple entries as a given site and they are labled alphabetically.         </skos:definition>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>       <!-- testing a link using skos:related to an NGDC concept -->     <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/core">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">core</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">A core of sub seafloor material from a site</skos:definition>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <skos:related rdf:resource="http://www.ngdc.noaa.gov/mgg/voc/sample_index/device/core"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/section">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">section</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">cores are dived into aproxiamtely 1.5 meter sections in order             to facilitate their handling and use in analysis machines         </skos:definition>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/waterdepth">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">water depth</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">Water depth a drilling is taking place in. Combined with             penetration this combines to form a string length. Water depth is measured in meters             below sea floor         </skos:definition>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/corecount">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">core count</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel xml:lang="en">cores recovered</skos:altLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">numeric count of cores from a hole</skos:definition>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/scienceprospectus">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">science prospectus</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altLabel xml:lang="en">scientific prospectus</skos:altLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">numeric count of cores from a hole</skos:definition>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/initialreportvolume">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">initial report volume</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">initial report volume</skos:definition>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/preliminaryreport">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">preliminary report</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">preliminary report</skos:definition>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/scientificreportvolume">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">scientific report volume</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">scientific report volume</skos:definition>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/proceedingreport">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">proceeding report</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">proceeding report</skos:definition>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf rdf:resource="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/"/>         <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#Property"/>     </skos:Concept>      <skos:Concept rdf:about="http://data.oceandrilling.org/core/1/coreInterval">         <skos:prefLabel xml:lang="en">core internal</skos:prefLabel>         <skos:altlable>meters cored</skos:altlable>         <skos:definition xml:lang="en">Cored interval in meters. Represents the amount of core             targeted for recovery         </skos:definition>         <dc:date>2011-04-28T00:00Z</dc:date>         <skos:topConceptOf
